entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 27 April 2023
